text: Battlestar Galactica is an American science fiction television series created by Glen A. Larson. It was originally broadcast from September 17, 1978 to April 29, 1979 on ABC. ==Other websites== * Category:ABC network series Category:English-language television programs Category:1970s American television series debuts Category:1970s American television series endings Category:American science fiction television series Category:1978 American television series debuts Category:1979 television series endings
title: Battlestar Galactica (1978 TV series)
